text: <!channel>: PPS is closed today due to really icy road conditions. UC will follow suit. WFH and check in with your producers. Temps may rise and if you do feel comfortable coming into the office, feel free but stay safe and take it slow if driving... :snow_cloud:

<!channel> world renowned philanthropist <@U026PLK4S> is hosting his annual super bowl coin toss bet. This year, though, if it’s tails, he’ll donate the pot to ACLU. If it’s heads, it goes to Planned Parenthood. If you’d like to contribute to the pot, hit him up with a commitment over DM or square him at <http://cash.me/$MatthewNoe|cash.me/$MatthewNoe>
